summary: This is an automatic out-of-office email reply from an Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) regarding a grand jury subpoena issued by the SDNY on July 5, 2019. The AUSA indicates they are on vacation and directs urgent matters to other AUSAs on the case.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: The sender of the out-of-office email reply, who is on vacation and handling matters related to a grand jury subpoena.

events.title: SDNY Grand Jury Subpoena Issued
events.description: A grand jury subpoena was issued by the Southern District of New York (SDNY).

events.title: AUSA Vacation Out-of-Office Reply
events.description: An AUSA sends an automatic email reply stating they are on vacation until August 12, 2019, and will have delayed email responses.

keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena was issued by the SDNY on July 5, 2019, indicating active federal investigation proceedings.
An Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) involved in the case was on vacation in early August 2019, with email access but delayed responses.
The email directs urgent matters to other AUSAs on the case, confirming multiple prosecutors were assigned.
